ISSUE.TITLE: Pluggable registry store
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Similar to #1997 but for registry credentials. In 0.6 registry credentials (for pulling private images) are stored and managed separately from secrets.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Unmarshalling the json into struct requires a pointer

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Storing a new registry in the registry store should use POST (see: https://github.com/drone/drone/issues/1998#issuecomment-293413965)
